Interface BotController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Controllable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseBotController, Lina, Sniper, TestBot

    public interface BotController
extends Controllable
    Simple Bot interface.
    Author:
    Banzindun

        void reset()
        Resets the bot.

      • update

        BotCommand update()
        Calls update on bot and will want to know what to do on reponse.
        Parameters:
        world - Representation of the world. // TODO remove
        Returns:
        Returns command that the hero should do in game.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initializes this bot controler. Called after bot creating and loaded interests (== bot context is fully functional).

      • setConfiguration

        void setConfiguration(HeroConfiguration bc)
        Sets the configuration for this controller.
        Parameters:
        bc - New bot configuration.

      • getConfiguration

        HeroConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Returns:

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Called when this controller should be destroyed.

      • getContext

        BaseBotContext getContext()
        Returns:
        Returns the bot's context. This will contains usable information around the bot and will be doing some sort of caching to for example calculate distances between objects only once.

      • updateHero

        void updateHero(Hero h)
        Updates our hero. We want to keep the reference pointing at the same object, so that controllers etc. don't need to ask for a hero reference every tick.
        Parameters:
        h - Hero that with it's id corresponds to our hero.
